title: How is Gandhi Medical College, Secunderabad? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Hii A2A I can say Gandhi medical collge is the best as compared to any collge in telangana state. Gandhi hospital have every department and we don't need to go for anyother hospital for the postings. Gandhi medical and hospital is at the central part of Hyderabad so we can go everywhere from our hostel. There is a lot to say about Gandhi medical college, but I can't say it by text. It's an emotion. Thanks you
